snippet: Two visits to a restaurant that was a departure from the Native American-themed visuals surrounding it helped form a complete picture.
abstract: Stephanie Lyness reviews Ballo Italian Restaurant and Social Club at the Mohegan Sun casino in Uncasville (Metropolitan/Connecticut).
lead_paragraph: Two visits to a restaurant that was a departure from the Native American-themed visuals surrounding it helped form a complete picture.
